meanings.definition: A detailed account or narrative of past events.
meanings.sent1: The recountal of the adventure was filled with exciting details.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed reading the recountal of her grandmother's childhood.
meanings.sent3: During the family dinner, the recountal of the camping trip made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His recountal of the fishing trip painted a vivid picture in our minds.
meanings.sent5: The recountal of the historical battle was so engaging that it felt like we were there.
